Abundant Maw.name: Abundant Maw
Abundant Maw.text:
Emerge {6}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

Decimator of the Provinces.name: Decimator of the Provinces
Decimator of the Provinces.text:
Emerge {6}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
Trample, haste

Distended Mindbender.name: Distended Mindbender
Distended Mindbender.text:
Emerge {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose from it a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less and a card with converted mana cost 4 or greater. That player discards those cards.

Drownyard Behemoth.name: Drownyard Behemoth
Drownyard Behemoth.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Emerge {7}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
Drownyard Behemoth has hexproof as long as it entered the battlefield this turn.

Elder Deep-Fiend.name: Elder Deep-Fiend
Elder Deep-Fiend.text:
Flash
Emerge {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, tap up to four target permanents.

Emrakul, the Promised End.flavor: An enigma as vexing as life itself.
Emrakul, the Promised End.name: Emrakul, the Promised End
Emrakul, the Promised End.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card type among cards in your graveyard.
When you cast this spell, you gain control of target opponent during that player's next turn. After that turn, that player takes an extra turn.
Flying, trample, protection from instants

Eternal Scourge.flavor: "It has latched onto this place like an infestation. All efforts at eradication have proved futile." —Yeter, Trostad villager
Eternal Scourge.name: Eternal Scourge
Eternal Scourge.text:
You may cast Eternal Scourge from exile.
When Eternal Scourge becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, exile Eternal Scourge.

It of the Horrid Swarm.name: It of the Horrid Swarm
It of the Horrid Swarm.text:
Emerge {6}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

Lashweed Lurker.name: Lashweed Lurker
Lashweed Lurker.text:
Emerge {5}{G}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, you may put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

Mockery of Nature.name: Mockery of Nature
Mockery of Nature.text:
Emerge {7}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Vexing Scuttler.name: Vexing Scuttler
Vexing Scuttler.text:
Emerge {6}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Wretched Gryff.name: Wretched Gryff
Wretched Gryff.text:
Emerge {5}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.)
When you cast this spell, draw a card.
Flying

Blessed Alliance.name: Blessed Alliance
Blessed Alliance.text:
Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Target player gains 4 life.
• Untap up to two target creatures.
• Target opponent sacrifices an attacking creature.

Borrowed Grace.name: Borrowed Grace
Borrowed Grace.text:
Escalate {1}{W} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or both —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

Bruna, the Fading Light.flavor: She now sees only Emrakul's visions.
Bruna, the Fading Light.name: Bruna, the Fading Light
Bruna, the Fading Light.text:
When you cast this spell, you may return target Angel or Human creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flying, vigilance
(Melds with Gisela, the Broken Blade.)

Brisela, Voice of Nightmares.flavor: Upon discovering what had become of her sisters, Sigarda could only weep.
Brisela, Voice of Nightmares.name: Brisela, Voice of Nightmares
Brisela, Voice of Nightmares.text:
Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink
Your opponents can't cast spells with converted mana cost 3 or less.

Choking Restraints.name: Choking Restraints
Choking Restraints.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Choking Restraints: Exile enchanted creature.

Collective Effort.name: Collective Effort
Collective Effort.text:
Escalate—Tap an untapped creature you control. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.

Courageous Outrider.flavor: One silvery blast signaled that she wouldn't be arriving at Thraben alone.
Courageous Outrider.name: Courageous Outrider
Courageous Outrider.text: When Courageous Outrider enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Dawn Gryff.flavor: After facing so many horrors, the survivors of Videns parish couldn't comprehend the hope that the gryff represented.
Dawn Gryff.name: Dawn Gryff

Deploy the Gatewatch.flavor: Gideon and Liliana may not have seen eye to eye, but that did not stop them from fighting side by side.
Deploy the Gatewatch.name: Deploy the Gatewatch
Deploy the Gatewatch.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put up to two planeswalker cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Desperate Sentry.name: Desperate Sentry
Desperate Sentry.text:
When Desperate Sentry dies, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
Delirium — Desperate Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Drogskol Shieldmate.flavor: "I will join you so that you will not yet join me."
Drogskol Shieldmate.name: Drogskol Shieldmate
Drogskol Shieldmate.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Drogskol Shieldmate enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

Extricator of Flesh.name: Extricator of Flesh
Extricator of Flesh.text:
Eldrazi you control have vigilance.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a non-Eldrazi creature: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

Extricator of Sin.name: Extricator of Sin
Extricator of Sin.text:
When Extricator of Sin enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, transform Extricator of Sin.

Faith Unbroken.name: Faith Unbroken
Faith Unbroken.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Faith Unbroken enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

Faithbearer Paladin.flavor: "I've seen cathars riding to battle without a hint of fear. Perhaps that is its own sort of madness." —Esler, Havengul mercenary
Faithbearer Paladin.name: Faithbearer Paladin
Faithbearer Paladin.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

Fiend Binder.flavor: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.
Fiend Binder.name: Fiend Binder
Fiend Binder.text: Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

Geist of the Lonely Vigil.flavor: The flicker of candlelight and the echo of hymns told the villagers that the monastery wasn't truly abandoned.
Geist of the Lonely Vigil.name: Geist of the Lonely Vigil
Geist of the Lonely Vigil.text:
Defender, flying
Delirium — Geist of the Lonely Vigil can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Gisela, the Broken Blade.flavor: She now hears only Emrakul's murmurs.
Gisela, the Broken Blade.name: Gisela, the Broken Blade
Gisela, the Broken Blade.text:
Flying, first strike, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, if you both own and control Gisela, the Broken Blade and a creature named Bruna, the Fading Light, exile them, then meld them into Brisela, Voice of Nightmares.

Give No Ground.name: Give No Ground
Give No Ground.text: Target creature gets +2/+6 until end of turn and can block any number of creatures this turn.

Guardian of Pilgrims.flavor: Immune to the physical warping caused by Emrakul, geists proved to be some of humanity's most important allies.
Guardian of Pilgrims.name: Guardian of Pilgrims
Guardian of Pilgrims.text: When Guardian of Pilgrims enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Ironclad Slayer.flavor: The best weapon is the one at hand.
Ironclad Slayer.name: Ironclad Slayer
Ironclad Slayer.text: When Ironclad Slayer enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.

Lone Rider.name: Lone Rider
Lone Rider.text:
First strike, lifelink
At the beginning of the end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, transform Lone Rider.

Long Road Home.flavor: The person who finishes a journey is rarely the same as the one who starts it.
Long Road Home.name: Long Road Home
Long Road Home.text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Lunarch Mantle.flavor: "A boon from the angels should never be cast aside." —Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor
Lunarch Mantle.name: Lunarch Mantle
Lunarch Mantle.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}, Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains flying until end of turn."

Peace of Mind.flavor: Not all minds touched by the Eldrazi turn to raging psychosis. Some simply withdraw from this world into memories of a better one.
Peace of Mind.name: Peace of Mind
Peace of Mind.text: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

Providence.flavor: There is power in prayer, regardless of who is listening.
Providence.name: Providence
Providence.text:
You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, your life total becomes 26.
Your life total becomes 26.

Repel the Abominable.flavor: "Fight for a better future, even if you may not live to see it." —Grete, Order of Saint Traft
Repel the Abominable.name: Repel the Abominable
Repel the Abominable.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Human sources.

Sanctifier of Souls.name: Sanctifier of Souls
Sanctifier of Souls.text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Sanctifier of Souls gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}{W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

Selfless Spirit.name: Selfless Spirit
Selfless Spirit.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Selfless Spirit: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Sigarda's Aid.flavor: The Order of Saint Traft found new strength with Sigarda's support.
Sigarda's Aid.name: Sigarda's Aid
Sigarda's Aid.text:
You may cast Aura and Equipment spells as though they had flash.
Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach it to target creature you control.

Sigardian Priest.flavor: Many whose faith was destroyed by Avacyn turned to the only angel who remained true to humanity.
Sigardian Priest.name: Sigardian Priest

Spectral Reserves.flavor: "My predecessors taught me of duty and commitment. It seems they have more to teach." —Wendin, veteran cathar
Spectral Reserves.name: Spectral Reserves
Spectral Reserves.text: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. You gain 2 life.

Steadfast Cathar.flavor: "The most resolute soldiers will press forward in the face of overwhelming odds." —Gideon Jura
Steadfast Cathar.name: Steadfast Cathar
Steadfast Cathar.text: Whenever Steadfast Cathar attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

Subjugator Angel.flavor: The remnants of Innistrad's corrupted angelic hosts collapsed to form the Flight of Nightmares.
Subjugator Angel.name: Subjugator Angel
Subjugator Angel.text:
Flying
When Subjugator Angel enters the battlefield, tap all creatures your opponents control.

Thalia, Heretic Cathar.flavor: "Salvation will not be granted by the Lunarch Council. It must be earned—at the edge of a sword, if necessary."
Thalia, Heretic Cathar.name: Thalia, Heretic Cathar
Thalia, Heretic Cathar.text:
First strike
Creatures and nonbasic lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

Thalia's Lancers.flavor: "Let the points of our lances lead the way."
Thalia's Lancers.name: Thalia's Lancers
Thalia's Lancers.text:
First strike
When Thalia's Lancers enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a legendary card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Thraben Standard Bearer.flavor: The uncorrupted rallied under Thalia's leadership and Sigarda's banner.
Thraben Standard Bearer.name: Thraben Standard Bearer
Thraben Standard Bearer.text: {1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

Advanced Stitchwing.flavor: "Improvement is a consequence of practice." —Stitcher Geralf
Advanced Stitchwing.name: Advanced Stitchwing
Advanced Stitchwing.text:
Flying
{2}{U}, Discard two cards: Return Advanced Stitchwing from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Chilling Grasp.name: Chilling Grasp
Chilling Grasp.text:
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Madness {3}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Coax from the Blind Eternities.flavor: At Nahiri's call, Emrakul traversed the vast emptiness between the planes and arrived on Innistrad.
Coax from the Blind Eternities.name: Coax from the Blind Eternities
Coax from the Blind Eternities.text: You may choose an Eldrazi card you own from outside the game or in exile, reveal that card, and put it into your hand.

Contingency Plan.flavor: "Improvisation is for those who failed to prepare." —Jace Beleren
Contingency Plan.name: Contingency Plan
Contingency Plan.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

Convolute.flavor: "There's no sense arguing with insanity." —Levana, Midnight Duelist
Convolute.name: Convolute
Convolute.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

Voracious Reader.name: Voracious Reader
Voracious Reader.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Curious Homunculus.name: Curious Homunculus
Curious Homunculus.text:
{T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are three or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, transform Curious Homunculus.

Displace.flavor: "I'll see you soon, Subjects 25 and 26. I've got a good feeling this time!"
Displace.name: Displace
Displace.text: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

Final Iteration.name: Final Iteration
Final Iteration.text:
Flying
Wizards you control get +2/+1 and have flying.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature token.

Docent of Perfection.name: Docent of Perfection
Docent of Perfection.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature token. Then if you control three or more Wizards, transform Docent of Perfection.

Drag Under.flavor: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.
Drag Under.name: Drag Under
Drag Under.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

Enlightened Maniac.flavor: "At last! Proof that it's not all in my head!"
Enlightened Maniac.name: Enlightened Maniac
Enlightened Maniac.text: When Enlightened Maniac enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

Exultant Cultist.flavor: Amid the gibbering chorus that rose from the drownyard temple, Jace recognized a single word: "Emrakul."
Exultant Cultist.name: Exultant Cultist
Exultant Cultist.text: When Exultant Cultist dies, draw a card.

Fogwalker.name: Fogwalker
Fogwalker.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
When Fogwalker enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Fortune's Favor.name: Fortune's Favor
Fortune's Favor.text: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Geist of the Archives.flavor: After reading the final words, it turns back to the first page and begins again.
Geist of the Archives.name: Geist of the Archives
Geist of the Archives.text:
Defender
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Grisly Anglerfish.name: Grisly Anglerfish
Grisly Anglerfish.text: {6}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

Grizzled Angler.name: Grizzled Angler
Grizzled Angler.text: {T}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Then if there is a colorless creature card in your graveyard, transform Grizzled Angler.

Identity Thief.name: Identity Thief
Identity Thief.text: Whenever Identity Thief attacks, you may exile another target nontoken creature. If you do, Identity Thief becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

Imprisoned in the Moon.flavor: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.
Imprisoned in the Moon.name: Imprisoned in the Moon
Imprisoned in the Moon.text:
Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

Ingenious Skaab.flavor: Heads and shoulders above the rest.
Ingenious Skaab.name: Ingenious Skaab
Ingenious Skaab.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}: Ingenious Skaab gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

Laboratory Brute.flavor: It keeps intruders out and experiments in.
Laboratory Brute.name: Laboratory Brute
Laboratory Brute.text: When Laboratory Brute enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.

Lunar Force.flavor: "Moonlight offers sublime warmth that brings me a comfort sunlight cannot provide."
Lunar Force.name: Lunar Force
Lunar Force.text: When an opponent casts a spell, sacrifice Lunar Force and counter that spell.

Mausoleum Wanderer.name: Mausoleum Wanderer
Mausoleum Wanderer.text:
Flying
Whenever another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, Mausoleum Wanderer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Sacrifice Mausoleum Wanderer: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is Mausoleum Wanderer's power.

Mind's Dilation.flavor: Infinite wisdom cannot be contained within a single mind.
Mind's Dilation.name: Mind's Dilation
Mind's Dilation.text: Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

Nebelgast Herald.name: Nebelgast Herald
Nebelgast Herald.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Whenever Nebelgast Herald or another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

Niblis of Frost.name: Niblis of Frost
Niblis of Frost.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Scour the Laboratory.name: Scour the Laboratory
Scour the Laboratory.text:
Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Draw three cards.

Spontaneous Mutation.name: Spontaneous Mutation
Spontaneous Mutation.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

Summary Dismissal.name: Summary Dismissal
Summary Dismissal.text: Exile all other spells and counter all abilities.

Take Inventory.flavor: A place for everything, and everything in its place.
Take Inventory.name: Take Inventory
Take Inventory.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Take Inventory in your graveyard.

Tattered Haunter.flavor: When the Nebelgast recedes, there are often stragglers.
Tattered Haunter.name: Tattered Haunter
Tattered Haunter.text:
Flying
Tattered Haunter can block only creatures with flying.

Turn Aside.flavor: "There are tides beyond those in the sea that are driven by Innistrad's silver moon. If you learn their patterns, you can channel them in fascinating ways." —Tamiyo
Turn Aside.name: Turn Aside
Turn Aside.text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

Unsubstantiate.flavor: "Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts." —Liliana Vess
Unsubstantiate.name: Unsubstantiate
Unsubstantiate.text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.

Wharf Infiltrator.name: Wharf Infiltrator
Wharf Infiltrator.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
Whenever Wharf Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Whenever you discard a creature card, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

Boon of Emrakul.flavor: All around Emrakul, life re-formed in her image.
Boon of Emrakul.name: Boon of Emrakul

Borrowed Malevolence.name: Borrowed Malevolence
Borrowed Malevolence.text:
Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Cemetery Recruitment.flavor: "There's a smoothness to my magic here that I don't find on any other plane."
Cemetery Recruitment.name: Cemetery Recruitment
Cemetery Recruitment.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.

Certain Death.flavor: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.
Certain Death.name: Certain Death
Certain Death.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Collective Brutality.name: Collective Brutality
Collective Brutality.text:
Escalate—Discard a card. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it. That player discards that card.
• Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
• Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Cryptbreaker.name: Cryptbreaker
Cryptbreaker.text:
{1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Tap three untapped Zombies you control: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Dark Salvation.flavor: Countless ghouls surged through Thraben's streets, and with them came the city's salvation.
Dark Salvation.name: Dark Salvation
Dark Salvation.text: Target player creates X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, then up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Zombie that player controls.

Dusk Feaster.flavor: The Voldaren lands remained well protected when Olivia's army marched from Lurenbraum Fortress.
Dusk Feaster.name: Dusk Feaster
Dusk Feaster.text:
Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Flying

Gavony Unhallowed.flavor: "We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there." —Grete, Order of Saint Traft
Gavony Unhallowed.name: Gavony Unhallowed
Gavony Unhallowed.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.

Graf Harvest.name: Graf Harvest
Graf Harvest.text:
Zombies you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{3}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

Graf Rats.name: Graf Rats
Graf Rats.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you both own and control Graf Rats and a creature named Midnight Scavengers, exile them, then meld them into Chittering Host.

Haunted Dead.name: Haunted Dead
Haunted Dead.text:
When Haunted Dead enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
{1}{B}, Discard two cards: Return Haunted Dead from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Liliana, the Last Hope.name: Liliana, the Last Hope
Liliana, the Last Hope.text:
+1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-1 until your next turn.
−2: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is two plus the number of Zombies you control."

Liliana's Elite.flavor: "You have to admit, Gideon—he has great form." —Liliana Vess
Liliana's Elite.name: Liliana's Elite
Liliana's Elite.text: Liliana's Elite gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.

Markov Crusader.flavor: The surviving members of the Markov bloodline drove through a crush of horrors to reclaim their ancestral home.
Markov Crusader.name: Markov Crusader
Markov Crusader.text:
Lifelink
Markov Crusader has haste as long as you control another Vampire.

Midnight Scavengers.name: Midnight Scavengers
Midnight Scavengers.text:
When Midnight Scavengers enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
(Melds with Graf Rats.)

Chittering Host.name: Chittering Host
Chittering Host.text:
Haste
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Chittering Host enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn.

Murder.flavor: "It's not work if you enjoy it."
Murder.name: Murder

Noosegraf Mob.name: Noosegraf Mob
Noosegraf Mob.text:
Noosegraf Mob enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever a player casts a spell, remove a +1/+1 counter from Noosegraf Mob. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

Oath of Liliana.name: Oath of Liliana
Oath of Liliana.text:
When Oath of Liliana enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
At the beginning of each end step, if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

Olivia's Dragoon.flavor: Displays of Voldaren bloodlust are not restricted to glamorous banquets and lavish parties.
Olivia's Dragoon.name: Olivia's Dragoon
Olivia's Dragoon.text: Discard a card: Olivia's Dragoon gains flying until end of turn.

Prying Questions.flavor: What remained of the Lunarch Inquisition found new ways to extract confessions.
Prying Questions.name: Prying Questions
Prying Questions.text: Target opponent loses 3 life and puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

Rise from the Grave.flavor: "Don't get too comfortable in there." —Liliana Vess
Rise from the Grave.name: Rise from the Grave
Rise from the Grave.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

Ruthless Disposal.flavor: "Do try to pull your weight, Geralf. I feel like I'm doing everything." —Ghoulcaller Gisa
Ruthless Disposal.name: Ruthless Disposal
Ruthless Disposal.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card and sacrifice a creature.
Two target creatures each get -13/-13 until end of turn.

Skirsdag Supplicant.flavor: "I can no longer stand by as these Skirsdag infiltrators rot the church from within. Even the Lunarch Council is compromised. What a fool I've been." —Odric
Skirsdag Supplicant.name: Skirsdag Supplicant
Skirsdag Supplicant.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each player loses 2 life.

Strange Augmentation.name: Strange Augmentation
Strange Augmentation.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Delirium — Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Stromkirk Condemned.flavor: "Blood from the vein is the finest vintage to accompany a feast of the mind." —Runo Stromkirk
Stromkirk Condemned.name: Stromkirk Condemned
Stromkirk Condemned.text: Discard a card: Vampires you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

Succumb to Temptation.name: Succumb to Temptation
Succumb to Temptation.text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

Thraben Foulbloods.flavor: The famed hunting hounds of House Cecani continue to prove the quality of their pedigree.
Thraben Foulbloods.name: Thraben Foulbloods
Thraben Foulbloods.text: Delirium — Thraben Foulbloods gets +1/+1 and has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Tree of Perdition.name: Tree of Perdition
Tree of Perdition.text:
Defender
{T}: Exchange target opponent's life total with Tree of Perdition's toughness.

Vampire Cutthroat.name: Vampire Cutthroat
Vampire Cutthroat.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

Abolisher of Bloodlines.name: Abolisher of Bloodlines
Abolisher of Bloodlines.text:
Flying
When this creature transforms into Abolisher of Bloodlines, target opponent sacrifices three creatures.

Voldaren Pariah.name: Voldaren Pariah
Voldaren Pariah.text:
Flying
Sacrifice three other creatures: Transform Voldaren Pariah.
Madness {B}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Wailing Ghoul.flavor: "Don't worry, sweet brother. Help is on the way." —Ghoulcaller Gisa
Wailing Ghoul.name: Wailing Ghoul
Wailing Ghoul.text: When Wailing Ghoul enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

Weirded Vampire.flavor: "Emrakul makes apparent those whom she has favored." —Runo Stromkirk
Weirded Vampire.name: Weirded Vampire
Weirded Vampire.text: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Whispers of Emrakul.flavor: Your thoughts are no longer your own.
Whispers of Emrakul.name: Whispers of Emrakul
Whispers of Emrakul.text:
Target opponent discards a card at random.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, that player discards two cards at random instead.

Abandon Reason.name: Abandon Reason
Abandon Reason.text:
Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Alchemist's Greeting.name: Alchemist's Greeting
Alchemist's Greeting.text:
Alchemist's Greeting deals 4 damage to target creature.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Assembled Alphas.flavor: There is always a toll to pay for passage.
Assembled Alphas.name: Assembled Alphas
Assembled Alphas.text: Whenever Assembled Alphas blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Assembled Alphas deals 3 damage to that creature and 3 damage to that creature's controller.

Bedlam Reveler.name: Bedlam Reveler
Bedlam Reveler.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Bedlam Reveler enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

Blood Mist.flavor: "Some claim that rage is a cloud that obscures thought and vision. But I can assure you—I've never seen with greater clarity."
Blood Mist.name: Blood Mist
Blood Mist.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

Bold Impaler.flavor: Burning with hatred for Nahiri, the Voldaren and Markov forces assaulted the warped Markov Manor with a collective fury not seen in centuries.
Bold Impaler.name: Bold Impaler
Bold Impaler.text: {2}{R}: Bold Impaler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Borrowed Hostility.name: Borrowed Hostility
Borrowed Hostility.text:
Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

Brazen Wolves.flavor: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.
Brazen Wolves.name: Brazen Wolves
Brazen Wolves.text: Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Collective Defiance.name: Collective Defiance
Collective Defiance.text:
Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.
• Collective Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature.
• Collective Defiance deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

Conduit of Emrakul.name: Conduit of Emrakul
Conduit of Emrakul.text: Whenever Conduit of Emrakul attacks, add {C}{C} at the beginning of your next main phase this turn.

Conduit of Storms.name: Conduit of Storms
Conduit of Storms.text:
Whenever Conduit of Storms attacks, add {R} at the beginning of your next main phase this turn.
{3}{R}{R}: Transform Conduit of Storms.

Deranged Whelp.flavor: "When you confront a wolf scorned by its pack, extra caution is the order of the day." —Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig
Deranged Whelp.name: Deranged Whelp
Deranged Whelp.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Distemper of the Blood.name: Distemper of the Blood
Distemper of the Blood.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Falkenrath Reaver.flavor: "Each day there are new reports of homes along Getander Pass and Hofsaddel falling to vampires of a more savage nature. I've even heard tell that Anje Falkenrath has returned. Please send whatever help you can." —Sterin Gorn, letter to Thalia
Falkenrath Reaver.name: Falkenrath Reaver

Furyblade Vampire.flavor: "Writhe all you want, filth. It will do you no good."
Furyblade Vampire.name: Furyblade Vampire
Furyblade Vampire.text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, Furyblade Vampire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

Galvanic Bombardment.flavor: Geist-powered devices have no shortage of fuel.
Galvanic Bombardment.name: Galvanic Bombardment
Galvanic Bombardment.text: Galvanic Bombardment deals X damage to target creature, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Galvanic Bombardment in your graveyard.

Hanweir Garrison.name: Hanweir Garrison
Hanweir Garrison.text:
Whenever Hanweir Garrison attacks, create two 1/1 red Human creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.
(Melds with Hanweir Battlements.)

Hanweir, the Writhing Township.name: Hanweir, the Writhing Township
Hanweir, the Writhing Township.text:
Trample, haste
Whenever Hanweir, the Writhing Township attacks, create two 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

Harmless Offering.name: Harmless Offering
Harmless Offering.text: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

Impetuous Devils.name: Impetuous Devils
Impetuous Devils.text:
Trample, haste
When Impetuous Devils attacks, up to one target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Impetuous Devils.

Incendiary Flow.flavor: "What's your plan?" Gideon asked. "Are you serious?" Chandra replied.
Incendiary Flow.name: Incendiary Flow
Incendiary Flow.text: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

Insatiable Gorgers.flavor: "Drink deeply, for there is no tomorrow!" —Anje Falkenrath
Insatiable Gorgers.name: Insatiable Gorgers
Insatiable Gorgers.text:
Insatiable Gorgers attacks each combat if able.
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Make Mischief.flavor: A tidy desk is as good as an invitation.
Make Mischief.name: Make Mischief
Make Mischief.text: Make Mischief deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. It has "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

Mirrorwing Dragon.name: Mirrorwing Dragon
Mirrorwing Dragon.text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Mirrorwing Dragon, that player copies that spell for each other creature they control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

Nahiri's Wrath.name: Nahiri's Wrath
Nahiri's Wrath.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Nahiri's Wrath deals damage equal to the total converted mana cost of the discarded cards to each of up to X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

Otherworldly Outburst.flavor: A tiny crack is enough to open the mind to Emrakul.
Otherworldly Outburst.name: Otherworldly Outburst
Otherworldly Outburst.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

Prophetic Ravings.flavor: "Keep your herons and shrews! You will find nothing in the moon, for the moon is a lie! It has told me so!"
Prophetic Ravings.name: Prophetic Ravings
Prophetic Ravings.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste and "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

Savage Alliance.name: Savage Alliance
Savage Alliance.text:
Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Creatures target player controls gain trample until end of turn.
• Savage Alliance deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Savage Alliance deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

Shreds of Sanity.flavor: A few gnawing thoughts can eat at the mind until nothing else remains.
Shreds of Sanity.name: Shreds of Sanity
Shreds of Sanity.text: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card. Exile Shreds of Sanity.

Erupting Dreadwolf.name: Erupting Dreadwolf
Erupting Dreadwolf.text: Whenever Erupting Dreadwolf attacks, it deals 2 damage to any target.

Smoldering Werewolf.name: Smoldering Werewolf
Smoldering Werewolf.text:
When Smoldering Werewolf enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
{4}{R}{R}: Transform Smoldering Werewolf.

Spreading Flames.flavor: "Hang on. I'm just tidying up." —Chandra Nalaar
Spreading Flames.name: Spreading Flames
Spreading Flames.text: Spreading Flames deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

Stensia Banquet.flavor: "We can't win a war on an empty stomach, can we?" —Olivia Voldaren
Stensia Banquet.name: Stensia Banquet
Stensia Banquet.text:
Stensia Banquet deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of Vampires you control.
Draw a card.

Stensia Innkeeper.flavor: "The perils of the road, you say? Don't worry. You won't have to face those again."
Stensia Innkeeper.name: Stensia Innkeeper
Stensia Innkeeper.text: When Stensia Innkeeper enters the battlefield, tap target land an opponent controls. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Stromkirk Occultist.name: Stromkirk Occultist
Stromkirk Occultist.text:
Trample
Whenever Stromkirk Occultist deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Thermo-Alchemist.flavor: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."
Thermo-Alchemist.name: Thermo-Alchemist
Thermo-Alchemist.text:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

Dronepack Kindred.name: Dronepack Kindred
Dronepack Kindred.text:
Trample
{1}: Dronepack Kindred gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Vildin-Pack Outcast.name: Vildin-Pack Outcast
Vildin-Pack Outcast.text:
Trample
{R}: Vildin-Pack Outcast gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{5}{R}{R}: Transform Vildin-Pack Outcast.

Weaver of Lightning.flavor: "Lightning in a bottle? That's not where I need it."
Weaver of Lightning.name: Weaver of Lightning
Weaver of Lightning.text:
Reach
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Weaver of Lightning deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

Backwoods Survivalists.flavor: Paranoia has driven some Kessig communities to hunt down anything—and anyone—that travels through their woods.
Backwoods Survivalists.name: Backwoods Survivalists
Backwoods Survivalists.text: Delirium — Backwoods Survivalists gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Bloodbriar.flavor: "There is a sourness here that I don't understand. When the land reaches out to me, I hesitate to reach back." —Nissa Revane
Bloodbriar.name: Bloodbriar
Bloodbriar.text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.

Clear Shot.flavor: "What worked to bring down angels will do the same for these horrors." —Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi
Clear Shot.name: Clear Shot
Clear Shot.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

Crop Sigil.name: Crop Sigil
Crop Sigil.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put the top card of your library into your graveyard.
Delirium — {2}{G}, Sacrifice Crop Sigil: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Crossroads Consecrator.flavor: "May the steel of your blade match the steel in your soul."
Crossroads Consecrator.name: Crossroads Consecrator
Crossroads Consecrator.text: {G}, {T}: Target attacking Human gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Eldritch Evolution.name: Eldritch Evolution
Eldritch Evolution.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

Emrakul's Evangel.flavor:
"In times like these, be particularly wary of those who claim they can save your soul."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig
Emrakul's Evangel.name: Emrakul's Evangel
Emrakul's Evangel.text: {T}, Sacrifice Emrakul's Evangel and any number of other non-Eldrazi creatures: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

Emrakul's Influence.flavor: Hordes of Eldrazi and cultists swarmed over Thraben's defenses, and the members of the Gatewatch found themselves overrun.
Emrakul's Influence.name: Emrakul's Influence
Emrakul's Influence.text: Whenever you cast an Eldrazi creature spell with converted mana cost 7 or greater, draw two cards.

Foul Emissary.name: Foul Emissary
Foul Emissary.text:
When Foul Emissary enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
When you sacrifice Foul Emissary while casting a spell with emerge, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

Gnarlwood Dryad.flavor: As Emrakul's influence radiated across Innistrad, evacuation from Kessig's remote villages became increasingly difficult.
Gnarlwood Dryad.name: Gnarlwood Dryad
Gnarlwood Dryad.text:
Deathtouch
Delirium — Gnarlwood Dryad gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Grapple with the Past.flavor: Emrakul does not grant wishes. Desires simply align to her will.
Grapple with the Past.name: Grapple with the Past
Grapple with the Past.text: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

Hamlet Captain.flavor: "Bloodsuckers, howlers, monsters from the beyond . . . it doesn't much matter. I won't have to face them alone."
Hamlet Captain.name: Hamlet Captain
Hamlet Captain.text: Whenever Hamlet Captain attacks or blocks, other Humans you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Ishkanah, Grafwidow.name: Ishkanah, Grafwidow
Ishkanah, Grafwidow.text:
Reach
Delirium — When Ishkanah, Grafwidow enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, create three 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach.
{6}{B}: Target opponent loses 1 life for each Spider you control.

Sinuous Predator.name: Sinuous Predator
Sinuous Predator.text: Sinuous Predator can't be blocked by more than one creature.

Noose Constrictor.flavor: "More rope may not be necessary." —Kep, Lunarch inquisitor
Noose Constrictor.name: Noose Constrictor
Noose Constrictor.text:
Reach
Discard a card: Noose Constrictor gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Permeating Mass.flavor: Woodland geists concluded that Emrakul would be unable to warp the denizens of the forest if the geists got there first.
Permeating Mass.name: Permeating Mass
Permeating Mass.text: Whenever Permeating Mass deals combat damage to a creature, that creature becomes a copy of Permeating Mass.

Prey Upon.flavor: The Somberwald has become a hunting ground for the Dronepack, the group of werewolves that have succumbed to the flesh-twisting power of Emrakul.
Prey Upon.name: Prey Upon
Prey Upon.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Primal Druid.flavor: "The power of the woods is only ever borrowed."
Primal Druid.name: Primal Druid
Primal Druid.text: When Primal Druid dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Howling Chorus.name: Howling Chorus
Howling Chorus.text:
Creatures with power less than Howling Chorus's power can't block it.
Whenever Howling Chorus deals combat damage to a player, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

Shrill Howler.name: Shrill Howler
Shrill Howler.text:
Creatures with power less than Shrill Howler's power can't block it.
{5}{G}: Transform Shrill Howler.

Somberwald Stag.flavor: Despite the reemergence of werewolves and the proliferation of Eldrazi, elk numbers in the Somberwald have remained steady.
Somberwald Stag.name: Somberwald Stag
Somberwald Stag.text: When Somberwald Stag enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

Spirit of the Hunt.flavor: The bonds of the pack transcend time and death.
Spirit of the Hunt.name: Spirit of the Hunt
Spirit of the Hunt.text:
Flash
When Spirit of the Hunt enters the battlefield, each other creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

Splendid Reclamation.flavor: "No matter how much a plane has suffered, there is a way to restore it." —Nissa Revane
Splendid Reclamation.name: Splendid Reclamation
Splendid Reclamation.text: Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Springsage Ritual.flavor: "Every evil destroyed is a strike against the enemy." —Erold, Gatstaf springsage
Springsage Ritual.name: Springsage Ritual
Springsage Ritual.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

Swift Spinner.flavor: Its web is woven so tightly that not even geists can avoid capture.
Swift Spinner.name: Swift Spinner
Swift Spinner.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Fibrous Entangler.name: Fibrous Entangler
Fibrous Entangler.text:
Vigilance
Fibrous Entangler must be blocked if able.
Fibrous Entangler can block an additional creature each combat.

Tangleclaw Werewolf.name: Tangleclaw Werewolf
Tangleclaw Werewolf.text:
Tangleclaw Werewolf can block an additional creature each combat.
{6}{G}: Transform Tangleclaw Werewolf.

Ulvenwald Observer.flavor: "I tell you, the trees were closing in! It's by the grace of the Heron alone that I made it out of the Ulvenwald!" —Ricton, traveling merchant
Ulvenwald Observer.name: Ulvenwald Observer
Ulvenwald Observer.text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, draw a card.

Waxing Moon.flavor: "Show them what it means to be the source of nightmares!" —Ulrich, Krallenhorde alpha
Waxing Moon.name: Waxing Moon
Waxing Moon.text: Transform up to one target Werewolf you control. Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

Wolfkin Bond.name: Wolfkin Bond
Wolfkin Bond.text:
Enchant creature
When Wolfkin Bond enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

Woodcutter's Grit.flavor: The magic used by Kessigers is known for its practical applications.
Woodcutter's Grit.name: Woodcutter's Grit
Woodcutter's Grit.text: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Woodland Patrol.flavor: Each had seen friends and family taken by the corruption, so each carried an axe at the other's request.
Woodland Patrol.name: Woodland Patrol

Bloodhall Priest.name: Bloodhall Priest
Bloodhall Priest.text:
Whenever Bloodhall Priest enters the battlefield or attacks, if you have no cards in hand, Bloodhall Priest deals 2 damage to any target.
Madness {1}{B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Campaign of Vengeance.flavor: "There is no saving this world, not anymore. But we shall be its bloody vengeance." —Sorin Markov
Campaign of Vengeance.name: Campaign of Vengeance
Campaign of Vengeance.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Gisa and Geralf.flavor: "These fiends are slightly less tolerable than you." "A sentiment that warms my heart, sister."
Gisa and Geralf.name: Gisa and Geralf
Gisa and Geralf.text:
When Gisa and Geralf enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.
During each of your turns, you may cast a Zombie creature card from your graveyard.

Grim Flayer.name: Grim Flayer
Grim Flayer.text:
Trample
Whenever Grim Flayer deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.
Delirium — Grim Flayer gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Heron's Grace Champion.flavor: Sigarda was the last uncorrupted archangel, but she would not have to fight alone.
Heron's Grace Champion.name: Heron's Grace Champion
Heron's Grace Champion.text:
Flash
Lifelink
When Heron's Grace Champion enters the battlefield, other Humans you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

Mercurial Geists.flavor: "Procedural misstep: provocation of geists for the purpose of yielding more energy can compromise containment units. Next action: clean up mess." —Laboratory notes
Mercurial Geists.name: Mercurial Geists
Mercurial Geists.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Mercurial Geists gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

Mournwillow.name: Mournwillow
Mournwillow.text:
Haste
Delirium — When Mournwillow enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, creatures with power 2 or less can't block this turn.

Ride Down.flavor: The Order of Saint Traft cleared the roads of cultists and horrors, opening the way for the villagers to flee Thraben.
Ride Down.name: Ride Down
Ride Down.text: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.

Spell Queller.name: Spell Queller
Spell Queller.text:
Flash
Flying
When Spell Queller enters the battlefield, exile target spell with converted mana cost 4 or less.
When Spell Queller leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

Tamiyo, Field Researcher.name: Tamiyo, Field Researcher
Tamiyo, Field Researcher.text:
+1: Choose up to two target creatures. Until your next turn, whenever either of those creatures deals combat damage, you draw a card.
−2: Tap up to two target nonland permanents. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
−7: Draw three cards. You get an emblem with "You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs."

Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha.name: Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha
Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha.text:
Whenever this creature transforms into Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha, you may have it fight target non-Werewolf creature you don't control.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha.

Ulrich of the Krallenhorde.name: Ulrich of the Krallenhorde
Ulrich of the Krallenhorde.text:
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Ulrich of the Krallenhorde, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulrich of the Krallenhorde.
